schema.description: Vendor performance analysis at the Purchase Order Item level, aggregated from various SAP S4 HANA tables.  Includes vendor cycle time, quality, on-time delivery, in-full delivery, invoice accuracy, and spend analysis in both source and target currencies.

description.value: Net Order Value in PO Currency
Currency Key of the Purchase Order
Total Goods Receipt Amount in Local Currency
Currency Key from Purchase Order History
Year of Purchase Order Creation Date
Month of Purchase Order Creation Date
Week of Purchase Order Creation Date
Total Invoice Amount in Source Currency
Total Goods Receipt Amount in Source Currency
Total Goods Receipt Amount in Target Currency
Net Order Value in Target Currency
Goods Receipt Amount in Target Currency
Indicates if the Purchase Order Item is delivered
Indicates if the Purchase Order Item is rejected

formula.value: IF(PurchaseDocuments.IsDeliveredInFull IS NULL OR PurchaseDocuments.IsDeliveredOnTime IS NULL, 'NotApplicable', IF(PurchaseDocuments.IsDeliveredInFull AND PurchaseDocuments.IsDeliveredOnTime, 'OTIF', 'NotOTIF'))

IF(PurchaseDocuments.IsGoodsReceiptAccurate IS NULL OR PurchaseOrdersInvoiceReceipt.InvoiceQuantity IS NULL, 'NotApplicable', IF(PurchaseDocuments.IsGoodsReceiptAccurate AND PurchaseDocuments.POQuantity_MENGE = PurchaseOrdersInvoiceReceipt.InvoiceQuantity, 'AccurateInvoice', 'InaccurateInvoice'))

description.value: Indicates if the Purchase Order Item is Past Due or Open
